name: LinkedIn People & Company Enrichment API
description: Extract B2B contact data from LinkedIn public profiles: job titles, companies, skills, education. Alternative to ZoomInfo ($15K+/year) at $0.03/profile via x402.

endpoints.description: Extract person profile: name, headline, location, company, experience, education, skills
Extract company data: name, description, industry, headquarters, employee count
Search people by title + location + industry
Find employees of a company by title filter
